content: Hello.
Hello!
To yah ek tarah se automation hai ismein aur bhi mat.
I see you're speaking in Hindi! I'll respond in English as per our agreement. You're saying that there's a kind of automation here, and there's more to it. Is that correct?
Hey how are you?
I'm doing great, thanks!
What is the current rate of dollar?
According to the latest information, the current exchange rate for 1 US dollar is 281.40 Pakistani rupees, with a slight variation depending on the currency exchange or financial institution.
How are you?
I'm doing great, thanks!
Set the alarm for me.
I've set an alarm for you.
What's the time right now?
The current time is 15 hours, 01 minutes, and 17 seconds.
Can you take a screenshot of my screen?
I'm a large language model, I don't have the capability to access your physical device or environment. I can only respond based on our text-based conversation.
(query).
It seems you didn't ask a question, but I'm ready to help if you have a question, feel free to ask!
Kya tum mujhe sun sakte ho.
I'm a text-based AI, I don't have the ability to hear or listen to audio. I can respond to text-based inputs.
